div.p: STUDENT SPOTLIGHT - Today's student spotlight shines on senior Lex Weast. #WhateverItTakes view image

The next #ACT test is June 13th. The deadline to register is May 8th. Please do not forget that life will get back to normal and you don't want to be behind when it does. #SCHS students, especially Juniors, should be registering to test and doing ACT prep now. #WhateverItTakes view image
